fields.Name: Red Hood
fields.Background: Born on August 16, 1990, as the son of two troubled drug addicts. He almost did not survive his first few months of life due to health conditions and parental neglect, and was once nearly sold to Carmine Falcone's criminal organization to settle his parentâ€™s debts. After his parents were killed by Sal Maroni for failed attempt to steal from one of the crime lord's warehouses, eight-year-old Jason was forced to live on the streets of Gotham. Batman caught him when he had already stolen one of the tires and was coming to take the others. Batman tried to put Jason in a boarding school for troubled kids, but this did not work out for Jason as the owner of the school was actually running a training ground for youthful criminals. Batman instead decides that perhaps the boy's anger could be channeled against criminals as or else the boy would likely end up a criminal himself. This is how Jason Todd became the second Robin.
fields.Strengths: Weapon Master, Skilled Swordsman, Master martial artial Artist, Peak Human Conditioning, Lazarus-Enhanced Capabilities
fields.Weaknesses: Severe mental trauma and PTSD from when The Joker killed him and he was resurrection by the Lazarus Pit
